column1: #text=Yesterday , I decided that I wanted to read a book and went to the library with my friend .
#text=We entered the library and started browsing through all the books .
#text=I remembered a mystery novel that I had read about and wanted to read .
#text=I went to the library 's computer and looked up the title of the mystery book to see if it was available .
#text=Luckily , it was available for me to check .
#text=I wrote down the call number and located the book in the stacks .
#text=I found my friend and told her that I found a book that I wanted to borrow and was ready to check out .
#text=I waited in line at the checkout counter and when I reached the front of the line , I greeted the librarian .
#text=I handed him the book and my library card and he scanned both into the library 's system , successfully borrowing the mystery book .
#text=I started reading it today and it is really good .
#text=I 'm so happy I found it at the library yesterday .
